thread.title: Aries Car Rental Offers a Range of Sedans and SUVs for Corporate Clients in Perth
thread.title_full: Aries Car Rental Offers a Range of Sedans and SUVs for Corporate Clients in Perth

title: Aries Car Rental Offers a Range of Sedans and SUVs for Corporate Clients in Perth
text: Aries Car Rental Offers a Range of Sedans and SUVs for Corporate Clients in Perth Australia, 12 October 2015 -- Aries Car Rental’s corporate car hire services offers a range of different cars for executive clients. They boast a new fleet of sedans and SUVs ideal for corporate visitors, professional managers, or for transporting employees.[PERTH, October 12, 2015] – Aries Car Rental offers a range of cars for corporate clients looking to visit Perth. Their SUVs and sedans are a great value for money choice for corporate visitors, professional managers, and executives looking to ride in style and comfort. Executive Transportation Services The Perth-based car rental service explains that a car should reflect the personality and look of a corporate client. They add that this also means finding the right transportation that can address their individual needs on top of representing their image. Aries Car Rental boasts a new fleet of sedans and SUVs ideal for the discerning professional. Apart from exuding the personality and image of the corporate client riding the vehicle, they add that it also comes at a great value. They note that among the many vehicles they offer, four stand out as the most popular for corporate clients: the Nissan Tiida, Nissan Dualis+2, Nissan Pulsar, and the Hyundai IMAX. The car rental company explains that among the four, the Nissan Pulsar and its variants are arguably the most popular. They note that the Nissan Pulsar Hatch Auto and its variants are 4-cylinder vehicles with five seats and full air conditioning, while the Pulsar Turbo boasts a Petrol Digi-Turbo 1.6 engine for a faster ride. They add that all vehicles are brand new, regularly maintained, and come with comprehensive insurance. Corporate Car Hire in Perth Aries Car Rental explains that when it comes to corporate car hire in Perth, they are the ones that can provide the finest selection of premium SUVs and Sedans at great value. All their vehicles are constantly maintained to ensure that clients have a safe and comfortable ride on the road. They add that they also allow clients to see a vehicle’s record of maintenance to give them peace of mind when travelling across the city. Whether it’s for corporate visitors, employees, or professional managers, the car rental company has the right vehicle that reflects their look and personality. About Aries Car Rental Aries Car Rental is a car rental company that offers quality and affordable car rental services throughout Perth. Apart from the corporate car hire, they also provide rental services for families, students, and travelers looking for a fast way to get to the city from the airport. For more information on their car rental services, visit their website at http://www.ariescarrental.com.au . # # #
